summary: The module offers a unit‑aware toolkit for relativistic physics, featuring a class that represents a moving particle and automatically derives its full set of relativistic properties from any single input (such as speed, momentum, or energy), as well as helper utilities that compute the Lorentz factor and total relativistic energy for given inputs.
business_intent: Enable researchers and engineers to perform precise, consistent relativistic calculations without manual conversion, supporting work in high‑energy physics, astrophysics, and accelerator design.
